title: Game Not Starting, "There was an error connecting with Maestro..."

embed.description: Post with 0 views. Anyone know how to fix?

body: So, when I tried to play LoL today, I got that, I tried restarting ma comp and I tried force playing it, didn't work, does anyone know how to fix?

replies.body: If you're having a problem connecting to Maestro, then run through some of the [troubleshooting steps found here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Elduris is gonna think I'm stalking him....

He's right on the money though. Maestro is a service that helps connect all the players and services together all at once. If you can't get connected to Maestro then there's a pretty good chance that we need to make some adjustments to your network settings. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some troubleshooting steps, but hit me back up if you need any help!

Ok, I managed t fix it, and when I updated to the new client yesterday, I could not find where the item set tab was. I noticed I didn't have the correct item for a hero, and I wanted to change it but I could not find it, where is it in the new UI? If they removed it, is it gone forever?
We don't have custom item sets enabled on the new client quite yet. It's on it's way for sure, but I don't know of an exact date for when you can expect it.

Do you have an approximation? Like a month, a week, something? Because it is annoying to have to write down sets and have to search items up every time I want to play a character I have not played on this smurf, and even on my main, the sets I have on there are from s4, and it is long due for an update.

you tried restarting your xbox?
